metadata.title: CVE-2023-35683 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In bindSelection of DatabaseUtils.java, there is a possible way to accessfiles from other applications due to SQL injection. This could lead tolocal information disclosure with no additional execution privilegesneeded. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
